thig5.2:1.4: I despised anything that wasn't on the same level.
thig5.2:2.2: with speech much variegated for fools.
thig5.2:2.3: I lived at the pleasure house,
thig5.2:3.2: I made visible much that was fit to be hidden.
thig5.2:3.4: and I made fun of many a person.
thig5.2:4.2: with a shaven-head, wrapped in the outer robe.
thig5.2:4.3: Sat down at the root of a tree,
thig5.2:4.4: I am one who gains much free from thought.
thig5.2:5.1: All attachments have been cut off,
thig5.2:5.4: I have become cool and quenched."
thig5.2:6.1: The Elder Vimalā, a Former Courtesan.
